replacements.{{legal_entity}}: üíº Legal entity: UK LLC, Latvian LLC, Deel/Payoneer
replacements.{{SUMMARY}}: Cross-stack engineer with 10+ years of experience, focusing on constructing distributed systems. Adept at task assessment, team-building, and implementing scalable solutions. Enthusiastic and dedicated professional, continuously seeking innovative approaches.
replacements.{{skills}}:
Scala / Java (Back-End)
<<SKILL_BULLET>> Having commercial experience as a developer and team lead, strong advocacy for functional programming, emphasizing simplicity and minimalism.
<<SKILL_BULLET>> Successfully transitioned 7 projects and initiated 6 new projects within the ZIO and Arrow ecosystem, resulting in enhanced code clarity, boosted performance efficiency, and increased execution stability.
<<SKILL_BULLET>> Leveraged Akka to design and implement an intricate microservices architecture encompassing service discovery, configuration management, load balancing, and fault tolerance.
<<SKILL_BULLET>> Achieved sub-millisecond performance using Netty, Aeron, CassandraDB to handle over 60,000 active sessions.
<<SKILL_BULLET>> Architected a high-performance transport system using GraphQL/Protobuf (gRPC)/Apache Avro across Web, Mobile, and IoT stacks for superior performance and declarative documentation.
replacements.{{exps}}:
Mvideo (06/2022 - Present) 2 years
Leading retail company specializing in electronics and household appliances.
https://mvideo.ru
Senior Full-Stack Developer / Full-time
<<EXP_BULLET>> Led the development of a new product from scratch, integrating 40,000 stores and 160,000 users into a unified platform.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Designed and implemented features to manage and distribute bonuses, track user performance, and display KPI results.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Architected a scalable backend system to handle large volumes of data efficiently, ensuring real-time processing and reporting.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Successfully integrated data from the SAP system, handling complex data migration and synchronization tasks.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Integrated various third-party services and APIs to enhance the platform's functionality and ensure smooth data synchronization.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Conducted extensive performance testing and optimization to guarantee system reliability and responsiveness.
Tech: Scala, Java, PostgreSQL, Docker, REST API, Kubernetes (k8s), SAP


EEG (07/2021 - 06/2023) 2 years
Full-stack esports and online gambling company fueled by video gaming growth.
https://www.eegpartners.com/
Senior Scala Developer / Full-time
<<EXP_BULLET>> Drove development of an advanced gambling platform, elevating the prototype to production and ensuring compliance.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Minimized incidents at launch and reduced the number of support calls.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Reduced user registration time from 10 minutes to 1 minute through UX structure improvements.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Proposed infrastructure elements that lowered maintenance costs and improved ease of change.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Built a fraud-prevention ML model with over 90% registration detection and cut downtime by half.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Improved processing time from 2.5 seconds to 30 ms by implementing a distributed load balancer.
Tech: Scala, Akka, Kubernetes (k8s), PostgreSQL


Tawasal (02/2020 - 06/2021) 2 years
Popular messenger in the UAE and super app for rentals, food, and tickets.
https://tawasal.ae/
Senior Scala Developer / Full-time
<<EXP_BULLET>> Modified high-load messenger services and designed infrastructure for managing data and module interactions.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Orchestrated architecture for 100,000+ users, enabling 5 instances while increasing performance via RAM usage.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Built SOA integration for the super-app, cutting integration development time from 1 month to 1.5 weeks.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Selected and mentored new team members and coordinated essential job documentation.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Researched and integrated a distributed cloud architecture, increasing scalability by 40% and reducing costs by 50%.
Tech: ZIO, Akka, F#, nix, C++


Yzer (08/2019 - 09/2020) 2 years
Viral messenger in the UAE with automatic message translation features.
https://appadvice.com/app/yzerchat-chat-and-video-calls/1398177737
Senior Scala Consultant / Part-time
<<EXP_BULLET>> Modeled critical application modules, consulted on development, and built data transport for high-load microservices.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Lowered latency from 500 ms to 59 ms through low-level optimization.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Influenced scaling architecture and optimized the project budget by 3 months, sustaining 56,000 users per day.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Built a high-load request model, reducing bottlenecks by 50% and improving performance visualization.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Optimized cloud architecture with on-prem tooling, improving response time by 100 ms and reducing server usage 10x.
Tech: Scala, Java, Protobuf, Rust, WebAssembly


Bolti (10/2018 - 08/2019) 2 years
Messenger / Chat Bot Platform.
Senior Scala Developer / Full-time
<<EXP_BULLET>> Reverse-engineered Telegram's MTProto protocol and implemented backend features for multiple device targets.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Delivered 95% of Telegram's general functionality in the platform.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Designed architecture serving 15,000 daily active users on a single server.
Tech: Scala, ZIO, C++, Kubernetes (k8s), Babel
replacements.{{education}}: 09/2011 - 05/2017 - Saint Petersburg State University (SPbU) - M.Sc. in Computer Science
replacements.{{entrepreneurship}}:
Buro (01/2017 - 12/2018) 2 years
SaaS for incorporation C-corp and LLC with bank integration.
https://buro.app
Co-founder, CTO / Full-time
<<EXP_BULLET>> Built an encrypted messaging tunnel to banks for KYC application transfers.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Built a system processing up to 500 incorporation requests per day.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Recruited and mentored a team of 7 developers, increasing completion speed by 35%.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Authored a fraud detection system reducing document validation time from 2 hours to 5 minutes.
Tech: Kotlin, Java, Spring, Spark, Thrift, Kafka, PostgreSQL


Minority (12/2015 - 12/2016) 2 years
Workflow management platform for describing daily activities and automating routine tasks.
https://minorityapp.com/
Co-founder, CEO, Full stack developer / Full-time
<<EXP_BULLET>> Researched market opportunities, increasing potential revenue by 30% and forming strategic partnerships.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Produced a prototype, built a marketing strategy, and identified key promotion channels.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Defined a feedback process and ran a fast agile development cycle.
<<EXP_BULLET>> Completed a startup accelerator program and won Best SaaS Award with a $10,000 grant.
Tech: Java, Spring, Hibernate, PostgreSQL, Redis
